entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
